Villa in Antalya

4.87 out of 5 average rating, 15 reviews4.87 (15)

Villa Beren Kemer center 300mt to the sea,ultra luxurious

In our triplex villa with elevator in Kemer center, there are 5 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms ( 1 with spa tub), marble covered Turkish bath, detached Sauna. 299mt from the sea with private pool, closed garage, luxury furnished, satellite tvs, music and camera system, lockboxes, linen-towels, washer and dryer, steam iron, all kitchen utensils are available. Seating or sofa are available in the bedrooms. We are waiting for you with love for super luxurious life in the paradise Kemer where mountain and sea meet.

Villa in Kumluca

5 out of 5 average rating, 13 reviews5 (13)

HillStone Adrasan, A premium Stone House

An original stone house built with premium quality and has a stylish design and decoration. Located on hill with a panoramic nature and sea view. Jacuzzi, casting wood stove and barbecue. Far away from crowds and in touch with Nature. *There are two bedrooms and each one has its own bathroom inside. *Offers pleasant chilly summer nights with its high altitude. *Open-air cinema (+Netflix +Trendyol Super League) *15 minutes away from Adrasan, Olympos and Chimaera beaches by car

Stone House with Olympos and Nature View

You can relax with your family and loved ones in this accommodation. Spectacular Olympos view and Nature View are waiting for you. Opportunity to walk on the grass in your own private garden.
